content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the panevėžys district court the court has made a final resolution regarding the division of matrimonial property between two parties the applicant has been awarded half of the plot of land the dwelling house and various household items and appliances the defendant has been awarded the other half of the plot of land the dwelling house and various movable objects the court has ordered the defendant to pay the applicant a monetary compensation of eur 8428 the text also discusses various aspects of matrimonial property in the civil code and the process of establishing the asset balance the plaintiff is seeking the dissolution of the marriage compensation for damages monthly maintenance payments and the division of matrimonial property and debts the court will decide on the division of assets based on their market value and will consider the wishes of the parties and relevant circumstances the costs of the proceedings will be apportioned between the parties the court has decided to dissolve the marriage and ordered the division of their assets the defendant is required to pay the applicant compensation for damages and the costs of the legal proceedings the defendant is also required to pay a stamp duty and the costs of serving procedural documents

metadata.cost: 443.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 650.00 EUR (legal fees) +  57.72 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
